2.1.2.2 ELABORATION AND DISCUSSION

Light Piping

A certain percentage of light must make it through the lens. Although there is a numerical analysis program to simulate the amount of light getting through a lens, the true test is on the part itself. Although this problem ranks last in quantity, it ranks first in average cost per problem because of the extensive technology required to provide a solution.

Models for Concurrent Engineering Design - 15 Jul 1997
